title: G-Kodes | Valid-FASTAs Configuration Schema
description: A JSON schema configuration file for the G-Kodes | Valid-FASTAs Snakemake pipeline

Data.description: A list of objects containing the properties of the provided data

Name.description: The name of the data file to be converted

VCF.description: An (absolute) path to the VCF files in question

Reference Genome.description: An (absolute) path to the reference genome FASTA file to be compared against

Reference SNPs.description: An (absolute) path to the dbSNP VCF file to be validated against

Executables.description: An object containing key references to the commands needed to fire the executable softwares required for this pipeline
